Value Set: Recommended treatment types ValueSet

valueString.value: Patient information to pre-populate the form with

publisher.value: HL7 International - Clinical Interoperability Council Group

name.value: HL7 International - Clinical Interoperability Council Group

description.value: Clinical response questionnaire at baseline (first doctors' visit)

text.value: General information
What is the patient's medical record number?
What is the patient's last name?
Demographic factors
Indicate the sex of the patient at birth:
In what year was the patient born?
Clinical factors
Indicate the patient's body height
Indicate the patient's weight.
Indicate the laterality of breast cancer
Indicate if this is the first breast cancer
Indicate if this is a new cancer on contralateral or ipsilateral breast
Tumor factors
Is the date of histological diagnosis known?
Indicate the initial date of histological diagnosis:
Indicate the histologic type of the tumor (select all that apply)
Indicate if the patient carries a germline mutation predisposing breast cancer
Indicate the grade of the invasive component of tumor
Indicate the tumor grade of DCIS component of tumor
Indicate the clinical tumor stage (per AJCC 8th Ed.):
Indicate the clinical nodal stage (per AJCC 8th Ed.):
Indicate the clinical distant metastasis (per AJCC 8th Ed.):
Indicate if the estrogen receptor status is positive:
Indicate if the progesterone receptor status is positive:
Indicate if the HER2 receptor status is positive:
Indicate if a molecular profiling tool was used. If so, which one?
Indicate the mammaprint score on a scale of 0.000 to 1.000
Indicate the oncotype score on a scale of 0 to 100
Indicate the endopredict score on a scale of 1.1 to 6.2
Treatment variables
Indicate if a multidisciplinary meeting was conducted
Which treatments did the multidisciplinary team recommend (select all that apply)?
